Hello {!Lead.FirstName}, We are sorry you were unable to keep your appointment on {!Recipient.Well_Formatted_Date__c} at {!Recipient.Well_Formatted_Time__c} . We understand that unforeseen circumstances can interrupt the flow of your schedule. We would like to take this opportunity to reschedule your FREE consultation and 3D CAT scan. We will set aside an hour of time for you to speak with our doctors and team. Please contact our office at {!Lead.Center_Phone_Number__c} or respond to this email to reschedule your free consultation. If you are no longer interested, please contact us so we may update our records. Looking forward to seeing you!
{!Lead.00N40000002G2cJ} Dental Implant Consultant
